T16D4441:353b-0: @353b * // lha dbang phyug gis tshogs bdag la gnang ba'i sa
T16D4441:353b-1: mu dra pha la'i sbyor ba kha bsgyur dang bcas
T16D4441:353b-2: pa ni / de yang thog mar sa mu dra
T16D4441:353b-3: pha la mang nyung ci rigs pa rdza snod gtsang
T16D4441:353b-4: mar blug la zhag bdun gyi bar ra'i chus spangs
T16D4441:353b-6: de grib bskams byas la zha thag chod pa dang /
T16D4441:353b-7: slar yang ba'i chus zhag bdun /
T16D4441:353b-8: bangga ra'i khu bas zhag bdun /
T16D4441:353b-9: ni ra gunda'i khu bas zhag bzhi /
T16D4441:353b-10: da dhu ra'i khu bas zhag gsum /
T16D4441:353b-11: 'bras chu skyur mos zhag gcig rnams spangs skems gong ltar rim bzhin byas la /
T16D4441:353b-12: de nas zhib par btags la thun tshad nyis 'gyur
T16D4441:353b-13: tsam re ni ra gunda'i khu bas rta byas btang
T16D4441:353b-14: bas mdze rigs brgyad gang gis na yang rtsa ba
T16D4441:353b-15: nas thon zhing khong skran dang yan lag khol bur
T16D4441:353b-17: ra'i chus rta byas khong du btang zhing dpral bar byugs na mgo bo na ba la phan no //
T16D4441:353b-18: ra'i chur brdar te mig la byugs na ling tog med par 'gyur ro //
T16D4441:353b-19: shel dkar dang mnyam du btang na bud med bu btsas pa'i bang tshad sel bar 'gyur ro //
T16D4441:353b-20: ra'i chus rta byas btang na mkhris pa'i nad thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro //
T16D4441:354a-0: ba'i dar ba dang mnyam du btang na pho ba na zhing spos @354a * //
T16D4441:354a-2: aa dza wa na dang mnyam du zos na dug rigs mtha' dag la phan no //
T16D4441:354a-3: hinggu dang mnyam du zos na srin nad zhi bar 'gyur ro //
T16D4441:354a-4: ha ri tal btul ma dang mnyam du zos na
T16D4441:354a-5: mdze dkar po thon par 'gyur zhing rma gsar rnying
T16D4441:354a-7: / ni mbu'i khu bas rta byas btang na pho ba'i gzer zhi (la la phud) bar 'gyur ro //
T16D4441:354a-8: nimbu'i 'bru dang mnyam du (shing kun) btang na mkhris pa'i nad thams cad la phan no /
T16D4441:354a-9: (ba ba la/) ha la dhi dang mnyam du btang kyang phan yon gong dang 'dra /
T16D4441:354a-10: ra'i chus rta byas btang na lus stobs che zhing mdangs dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
T16D4441:354a-11: kungku ma'i khu ba dang mnyam du btang na skya rbab la phan no //
T16D4441:354a-12: yang gur gum gyi khu bas rta byas khong du
T16D4441:354a-13: btang zhing rna bar yang blug na rna ba 'on
T16D4441:354a-15: ra'i chu la brdar nas mig la byugs na srod long sel lo ;
T16D4441:354a-16: / ra'i chus rta byas btang na dbugs (gur gum) stod du 'tshangs pa sel lo //
T16D4441:354a-17: ni ra guntha'i khu bas rta byas zos na bud med dbang du 'dus so //
T16D4441:354a-18: sbrang rtsi dang mnyam du btang na lce'i dog sel lo //
T16D4441:354a-19: ko ci la 'bras tsam re dang mnyam du btang
T16D4441:354a-20: na skra rgya sma ra sogs dkar por song ba
T16D4441:354a-22: ni ra gunda'i khung dang mnyam du zos na skya
T16D4441:354a-23: rbab sel bar 'gyur zhing chu nad tsha grang gang
T16D4441:354a-25: ha la dhi dang mnyam du btang na khrag mkhris kyi nad zhi bar byed do //
T16D4441:354a-26: ha la dhi dang mnyam du ba mar la sbyar
T16D4441:354a-27: nas lba ba la byugs na skem par 'gyur ro
T16D4441:354a-28: / kha mdog gcig ma'i mar la sbyar nas mig
T16D4441:354a-29: la byugs na 'dre gdon gang gis kyang gnod pa
T16D4441:354a-30: / mi 'byung ngo // til mar la sbyar (sga
T16D4441:354a-31: ser) nas mig la byugs na mig gi nad thams
T16D4441:354a-32: cad la phan (sga ser) zhing gsal bar 'gyur ro
T16D4441:354a-33: / mi 'byung ngo // // ni ra gunda'i khu
T16D4441:354a-34: bar sbyar la snar blug na yams mgo phyed na
T16D4441:354a-36: ba dar gyis rta byas btang na dmu rdzings kyi
T16D4441:354a-38: nad sel lo // tu la se ka (tu la
T16D4441:354a-39: se'i mi tog) pa ta dang mnyam du zos na
T16D4441:354a-40: tsha ba'i nad thams cad sel lo //
T16D4441:354b-0: tsa ra tsi ri dang mnyam du zos na stobs glang po dang mnyam par @354b 'gyur ro //
T16D4441:354b-3: bee ri gsum gyi khu ba zho bzhi re dang
T16D4441:354b-4: mnyam du zos na dangs ma 'phel zhing lus stobs
T16D4441:354b-5: che la mdangs gsal zhing gzhon sha chags pa sogs
T16D4441:354b-6: phan yon dpag tu med do //
T16D4441:354b-7: de rnams ni sa mu dra pha la kha sgyur dang bcas pa'o //
T16D4441:354b-16: shun pa rnams so sor zho drug cu re gnyis ra /
T16D4441:354b-17: nag ri mu sa ri zho lnga bcu nga dgu /
T16D4441:354b-18: tsa ka ba dza gzho nyi shu rtsa drug /
T16D4441:354b-19: d'a li tsi ni zho bco lnga rnams zhib par
T16D4441:354b-20: btags la / bu ram zho drug brgya dang mnyam
T16D4441:354b-21: du 'dres par (li khri aa ru ra ba ru
T16D4441:354b-22: ra skyu ru ra) snur la legs par 'dres pa
T16D4441:354b-23: dang ril bu sum brgya bsgril la /
T16D4441:354b-24: de nas snga dro zas gang yang ma zos pa'i
T16D4441:354b-25: sngon du ril bu re nyin ltar gyis zla ba
T16D4441:354b-26: (shing tsha) gcig gi bar zos na khog nang gi
T16D4441:354b-27: nad thams cad zhi bar 'gyur la /
T16D4441:354b-28: zla ba gnyis kyi bar du zos na lus yang bar 'gyur ro //
T16D4441:354b-29: zla ba gsum gyi bar du zos na mdangs gsal /
T16D4441:354b-30: zla ba bzhi'i bar du zos na stobs 'phel /
T16D4441:354b-31: zla ba lnga'i bar du zos na skra dkar por song ba skra nag por 'gyur /
T16D4441:354b-32: zla ba drug gi bar du zos na lus rgyags par 'gyur /
T16D4441:354b-33: zla ba bdun gyi bar du zos na gla ba'i mig ltar gsal bar 'gyur la /
T16D4441:354b-34: zla ba brgyad kyi bar du zos na sems dran
T16D4441:354b-35: pa gsal zhing sngar brjed pa rnams kyang dran par
T16D4441:354b-36: 'gyur ro // zla ba dgu'i bar du zos na
T16D4441:354b-37: rgyang ring po yang mig gis mthong bar 'gyur ro
T16D4441:354b-38: 'gyur ro // // zla ba bcu'i bar du zos
T16D4441:354b-39: na sa 'og gi gter mang po rnyed par 'gyur
T16D4441:354b-40: ba sogs yon tan mtha' yas so //
T16D4441:354b-47: bhangga ra rnams so so nas srang bco lnga re /
T16D4441:354b-48: sadzdzha khar dang lu ha tsurna gnyis zho bcu gnyis re /
T16D4441:354b-49: te dza ba la zho gsum /
T16D4441:354b-50: simba ri ...(ma nu rta rkang) zho bzhi rnams zhib
T16D4441:354b-51: par btags la bu ram rnying pa srang drug cu
T16D4441:354b-52: dang / (aa ru ra ba ru ra skyu ru
T16D4441:354b-53: ra thal dkar rdo rje) mnyam du snur la legs
T16D4441:354b-54: (li khri) par 'dres pa dang ril bu sum brgya
T16D4441:354b-55: bsgril (zi tsha) la de nas snga dro lto (lcags
T16D4441:354b-56: phye) stong la ril bu re nyin ltar gyis zla
T16D4441:355a-1: bar zos pas khong nang gi nad dang mi gtsang
T16D4441:355a-2: ba mtha' dag dbyung ste lus shel gong ltar 'gyur
T16D4441:355a-3: ro // zla ba gnyis kyi bar zos na mdangs gsal bar 'gyur /
T16D4441:355a-4: zla ba gsum gyi bar du zos na lus stobs dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
T16D4441:355a-5: zla ba bzhi'i bar du zos na bad kan gyi
T16D4441:355a-6: nad thams cad rtsa ba nas thon par 'gyur ro
T16D4441:355a-7: // zla ba lnga'i bar du zos na skra dang
T16D4441:355a-8: kha spu dkar por song ba slar nag por 'gyur
T16D4441:355a-9: // ro // zla ba drug gi bar du zos na so don pa slar skye bar 'gyur ro //
T16D4441:355a-10: zla ba bdun gyi bar du zos na mig shin
T16D4441:355a-11: tu gsal zhing rgyang ring po 'ang mthong bar 'gyur
T16D4441:355a-12: ro // zla ba brgyad kyi bar du zos na
T16D4441:355a-13: mdze'i rigs thams cad rtsa ba nas thon par 'gyur
T16D4441:355a-14: ro // ro // zla ba dgu'i bar du zos
T16D4441:355a-15: na dangs ma shin tu 'phel zhing lus gzi brjid
T16D4441:355a-16: dang ldan la 'dod pa'ang ci 'dod spyod nus par
T16D4441:355a-17: ro // ro // 'gyur ro // zla ba bcu'i
T16D4441:355a-18: bar du zos na mngon par shes pa thogs med
T16D4441:355a-19: 'byung ba sogs phan yon bsam pa'i rab las 'das
T16D4441:355a-21: lag sha la brten pa'i man ngag khyad par can
T16D4441:355a-22: kun la med pa'i khyad chos /
T16D4441:355a-23: slob dpon ha ri ha ri bha tsi'i gdams pa zab mo ni /
T16D4441:355a-24: pa la sha ba dze'i snum legs par bton la /
T16D4441:355a-26: sbrang rtsi se ba phyed gnyis /
T16D4441:355a-27: ba mar se ba do ste yongs sgril se ba
T16D4441:355a-28: bzhi'i rtsis re grangs ltar chags rgyun du zos na
T16D4441:355a-29: nyin mo'ang skar ma thams cad mthong /
T16D4441:355a-30: tshe ring thung lha dang mnyam /
T16D4441:355a-31: gzhan gyis mthong na (ba la sha'i 'bru) lus shin
T16D4441:355a-32: tu ring zhing sbom pa blos mi 'khyud pa tsam
T16D4441:355a-33: du mthong / gzi brjid nyi ma dang mnyam pas gzhan gyis glags lta bar mi nus /
T16D4441:355a-34: lus mdzes shing blta na sdug pa 'dod lha dang mnyam /
T16D4441:355a-35: gang 'dod du bsam pa tsam gyis sleb /
T16D4441:355a-36: glo gros phur bu dang mnyam /
T16D4441:355a-37: gang smras kun gyis bden par 'dzin zhing nyan ba dga' byed dpa' bo dang mtshungs /
T16D4441:355a-38: lus la gzhan gang gis kyang gnod pas mi tshugs /
T16D4441:355a-39: rang nyid lus 'dor bar 'dod na ma gtogs stobs
T16D4441:355a-40: rtsal dang ldan par bskal ba grangs med kyi bar
T16D4441:355a-42: yang tho rangs gong bzhin la /
T16D4441:355a-43: phyi dro pa la sha'i rtsa ba //
T16D4441:355b-2: me tog /'bras bu lnga cha mnyam zhib par btags pa se ba bzhi /
T16D4441:355b-3: ba mar dang sbrang rtsi se ba do re bcas
T16D4441:355b-4: zos na sa gzhir rkang pa khru gang tsam ma
T16D4441:355b-6: lcags sa dang zangs me la bsregs par dri chu bran na gser du 'gyur /
T16D4441:355b-7: lus la grib ma ma 'byung ba sogs yon tan dpag tu med pa thob /
T16D4441:355b-8: da yang thog mar sman btang nas lo bcu gnyis
T16D4441:355b-9: tshun gong gi rtags de rnams rdzogs par rim can
T16D4441:355b-10: du 'byung ngo // thog ma sman sbyor ba dang
T16D4441:355b-11: za ba gnyis ka gza' skar legs pa la byed
T16D4441:355b-12: du 'byung ngo // do // nad gsar rnying cha
T16D4441:355b-13: grang gang la'ang sbyongs 'gro ba'i rigs la gtong na
T16D4441:355b-14: du 'byung ngo // do // / bi da ra
T16D4441:355b-15: zhib par btags la zho gsum chu skol gyis phul
T16D4441:355b-16: la btang nas lus ma 'khyags pa byas /
T16D4441:355b-17: de nas ma dag par chu skol gyis lcag rim
T16D4441:355b-18: bzhin rgyab la gcod mtshams su sleb pa dang rkang
T16D4441:355b-19: lag chu grang mos bkrus par chod la /
T16D4441:355b-20: rjes kyi zas spyod sogs sbyong spyi dang 'dra'o //
T16D4441:355b-28: pippa la ka mu la shunthi /
T16D4441:355b-29: si la dza ta rnams srang re /
T16D4441:355b-30: ha ri ta ka srang lnga rnams zhib par btags
T16D4441:355b-31: la bu ram srang bco lngas rta byas ril bu
T16D4441:355b-32: skyu ru ra tsam sgril la chu skol bzhi cha
T16D4441:355b-33: bsdus pa tsam (dbyi mong) gyis phul (pho ris drod
T16D4441:355b-34: sman byi thang ka shug pa rgyam tsha pi pi
T16D4441:355b-35: ling gi rtsa ba lga) nas tho rangs btang bas
T16D4441:355b-43: pho ba spos 'khrog / kha dri mi zhim pa /
T16D4441:355b-45: 'dus pa rnams la mchog tu phan zhing dang kha 'byed par 'gyur ro //
T16D4441:355b-46: ka ka dzam gi'i rtsa ba nad pa'i chu la
T16D4441:355b-47: brdar nas rma gang yod la byugs pas mda' gri
T16D4441:355b-48: phog pa sogs ma gsar rnying kun bsos shing khrag
T16D4441:355b-49: kyang chad do // khyi smyo ba dang ma smyo ba gang gis rmugs kyang /
T16D4441:355b-50: tsa ra tsi ri'i lo ma phyed dang gsum /
T16D4441:355b-51: bu ram ba ru ra tsam de dang mnyam du khong du btang zhing /
T16D4441:355b-52: lo ma chur brdar ba rma khar yang byugs pas
T16D4441:355b-53: rma myur du bsos zhing khyi dug gi gnod pa
T16D4441:356a-8: chang zho bcu bzhu ba'i nang du dngul chu zho //
T16D4441:356a-9: sa pa dang rdza'i spar [?] bu lta bu khebs
T16D4441:356a-10: ldan gyi nang tshva zhib mos brgyangs pa'i dkyil du
T16D4441:356a-11: bcug nas kha legs par bcad /
T16D4441:356a-12: (gsha' dkar la sogs pa btul ma 'di rnams sman
T16D4441:356a-13: sbyor gang dang gang gi skabs su de dang de
T16D4441:356a-14: btul dgos pa byung na so so'i kha sgyur rnams
T16D4441:356a-15: dor te btags par) x thug nas phyed tsam gyis
T16D4441:356a-16: gtums / de nas sa dong khru gang tsam zhig
T16D4441:356a-17: brus la ra'i ril mas bkang ba'i dkyil du bcug
T16D4441:356a-18: / de la me sbar te me ma yal tsam
T16D4441:356a-19: la slar yang ril ma bsnan te zhag gsum gyi
T16D4441:356a-20: x xx x ba'i khu ba srang lnga dang mnyam
T16D4441:356a-21: du blugs la kha legs par bsdams nas kha mtshams
T16D4441:356a-22: 'jim pas byugs la rlung mi 'gro bar byas te
T16D4441:356a-23: nyin phyed tsam gyi bar shing gi me mtshams ma
T16D4441:356a-24: gtums / chad par btang / de nas bton la
T16D4441:356a-25: grang thag chod thog rdo gzhong gi nang du zhib
T16D4441:356a-26: gtums / chad par btang / par btags / thog mar gro tsam re dang /
T16D4441:356a-27: de nas sran ma tsam re dz'a ti'i bzhi cha re dang mnyam du btang na lus stobs 'phel /
T16D4441:356a-29: gzhon sha chags pa sogs yon tan mtha' yas pa 'byung ngo //
T16D4441:356a-31: singga ra pha srang do bil ba'i 'bras bu'i kha
T16D4441:356a-32: nas mtheb gang tsam ma chags pa sgor ba'i nang
T16D4441:356a-33: du blug / de nas sgor ba des kha bcad
T16D4441:356a-34: / ras brdungs pa bsres pa'i 'jim pa sbyin po'i srab mthug nas gang tsam gyis gtums /
T16D4441:356a-35: de nas sa dong brus la ra'i ril ma'i nang
T16D4441:356a-36: na me gtong lugs yun tshad sogs (rgya mtshal) gong
T16D4441:356a-38: 'jim pa la sogs gang legs par byas rjes rgya
T16D4441:356a-39: mtshal bil ba dang dbyer med song ba de rdo
T16D4441:356a-40: gzhong gi nang du legs par snur la sran ma
T16D4441:356a-41: tsam re li shi rdog bzhi tsam btags pa dang
T16D4441:356a-42: mnyam du btang kyang yon tan gong dang 'dra'o //
T16D4441:356a-44: aa bha ...(lhang tsher) ka srang lnga /
T16D4441:356a-45: snum bton pa'i ro ma ba chu srang bcu dang
T16D4441:356a-46: mnyam du legs par brdungs te srab mthug bag leb
T16D4441:356b-0: tsam @356b byas la skam thag chod pa dang gci
T16D4441:356b-1: ba'i me'i dkyil du nyin phyed tsam gyi bar bsregs
T16D4441:356b-2: / de nas bton la grang thag chod pa dang
T16D4441:356b-3: gi la ko ti'i khu ba dang mnyam du rdo
T16D4441:356b-4: gzhong nang du nyin gcig gi ring brdar te slar
T16D4441:356b-5: yang srab mthug bag leb tsam bzos /
T16D4441:356b-6: de skam thag chod pa dang gong bzhin gci ba'i me nang du nyin phyed kyi bar bsregs /
T16D4441:356b-7: ma he ri'i khu bas nyin gcig gi bar nyed
T16D4441:356b-8: pa dang bag leb tsam bcos nas gci ba'i mer
T16D4441:356b-9: bsregs pa sogs sngar bzhin byas /
T16D4441:356b-10: ban bu thi'i khu ba dang mnyam du nyed pa
T16D4441:356b-11: sogs gzhan ma gong dang 'dra ba la gci ba'i
T16D4441:356b-12: me nang du nyin gcig gi bar bsregs la /
T16D4441:356b-13: de nas grang thag chod pa dang bton la rdo
T16D4441:356b-14: gzhong nang du zhib par btags la ras la btsags
T16D4441:356b-15: / de nas 'bras tsam re li shi bzhi tsam
T16D4441:356b-16: brdungs pa'i phye ma dang mnyam du btang bas lus
T16D4441:356b-20: 'dod pa spyod nus pa sogs stobs bskyed kun gyi mchog tu 'gyur ro //
T16D4441:356b-22: tamba mang nyung ji ltar 'dod pa sbrang gshog legs par 'then te mer bsregs /
T16D4441:356b-23: de snum gyi dkyil du bcug / yang mer bsregs /
T16D4441:356b-24: snum nang du 'jug pa sogs lan bdun gyi bar byas /
T16D4441:356b-25: de bzhin du rim pa ltar ;
T16D4441:356b-28: ba'i zho star bu'i khu ba rnams lan bdun (zangs) re byas rjes /
T16D4441:356b-29: de nas rdza snod du ra'i chu zangs mang nyung
T16D4441:356b-30: dang bstun pa'i snod kyi phyed tsam gang ba blug
T16D4441:356b-32: chu de skam thag chod pa dang chu gtsang mas legs par bkrus /
T16D4441:356b-33: de nas dngul chu zangs leb gang yod kyi phyi
T16D4441:356b-34: nang tshang mar mdog dkar por ma song bar byugs
T16D4441:356b-35: / de steng bhangga ri'i khu ba legs par byugs /
T16D4441:356b-36: de nas zangs dang ljid mnyam pa'i mu zi ser
T16D4441:356b-37: po btags pa zangs brtsegs pa'i srubs la khod snyoms
T16D4441:356b-38: yod pa byas nas khog ma gsar pa'i nang du
T16D4441:356b-39: bcug / khog ma'i kha dam par bcad de kha
T16D4441:356b-40: mtshams 'jim pas gtums nas rlung mi 'gro bar bya
T16D4441:356b-41: bcug / / de lcags sgyed lta bu'i steng du
T16D4441:356b-42: bzhag nas nyin gnyis dang mtshan gcig gi bar me
T16D4441:356b-44: de yang nyin dang po la me cung zad chung ba btang /
T16D4441:357a-1: phyi ma gnyis la shin tu tsha ba btang /
T16D4441:357a-2: de nas grang thag chod pa dang ras kyi khud
T16D4441:357a-3: du gtums nas chu gtsang mar 'jug 'don thengs lnga
T16D4441:357a-4: tsam byas / de rjes skam thag chod pa dang rdo gzhong du zhib par btags /
T16D4441:357a-5: de nas 'bras tsam re nam zla grang dus li shi dang /
T16D4441:357a-6: dro dus ka ko la dang mnyam du btang bas
T16D4441:357a-7: pho ba'i me drod ches cher bskyed de zas gang
T16D4441:357a-8: zos kyang 'phral du 'ju bas dang kha shin tu
T16D4441:357a-9: bde la lus gzi mdangs dang stobs rtsal che zhing
T16D4441:357a-10: gzhon sha chags pa sogs yon tan dpag tu med
T16D4441:357a-12: lu ha mang nyung ji ltar 'dod pa srab 'thug
T16D4441:357a-13: nas phyed tsam brdungs pa sor bzhi gru bzhi tsam
T16D4441:357a-14: pa bcos / de rdza snod kyi nang du bi
T16D4441:357a-15: sa kha pa ri'i khu ba dang mnyam du blug
T16D4441:357a-16: la nyi ma gang tsha sar zhag nyi shu'i bar
T16D4441:357a-17: khu ba skam rim bzhin blug nas bzhag / zhag
T16D4441:357a-18: grangs them pa dang bton la slar yang gong (lcags)
T16D4441:357a-19: bzhin la phug btsir ba'i khu ba dang mnyam du
T16D4441:357a-20: zhag nyi shu'i bar bzhag / de nas bton la
T16D4441:357a-21: sol ba'i me nang du skam pas bzung la dmar
T16D4441:357a-22: por tshig pa dang ba'i chu'i nang du bcug /
T16D4441:357a-23: slar yang sreg 'jug gong bzhin lan lnga'i bar byas
T16D4441:357a-24: pa bcos / la / de nas rdo gzhong nang
T16D4441:357a-25: du zhib par btags la nas tsam re nam zla
T16D4441:357a-27: dro dus ka ko la dang mnyam du zos pas dangs ma 'phel zhing lus stobs bskyed la /
T16D4441:357a-28: mu sa ba ra dang mnyam du zos na dmu rdzings dang skya rbab sel /
T16D4441:357a-29: aa ka ra ka dang la bangga cha mnyam btags pa se ba phyed do dang /
T16D4441:357a-30: gong gi lcags phye se ba phyed bcas btang na dang kha mi bde ba /
T16D4441:357a-32: mig ser rnams la phan no /
T16D4441:357a-33: zha nye nag po 'dul thabs ni /
T16D4441:357a-34: shi sha mang nyung ji ltar 'dod pa srab mthug ras tsam brdungs pa sen mo tsam du gtubs /
T16D4441:357a-35: (li shi) de dang ljid mnyam pa'i pippa la dang
T16D4441:357a-36: mnyam du rdo gzhong nang du nyin gnyis kyi bar
T16D4441:357a-38: de nas ras la btsags pa se ba phyed shel
T16D4441:357a-39: dkar dang li shi cha mnyam (zha nye nag po)
T16D4441:357a-40: du btags pa zho re dang mnyam du btang na
T16D4441:357a-41: / lus shin tu rid cing shed med pa sogs
T16D4441:357b-0: la mdangs dang lus (drod sman) stobs mchog @357b tu
T16D4441:357b-3: sa ta ji ltar 'dod pa lcags snod du bzhu
T16D4441:357b-4: ba de dang ljid mnyam pa'i bku tsi zhib par
T16D4441:357b-5: btags pa thug thal ltar 'debs shing dkrug / de
T16D4441:357b-6: legs par 'dres nas nas bangs [?] pa dang rdo
T16D4441:357b-7: gzhong nang du zhib par btags la ras la btsags
T16D4441:357b-8: pa se ba phyed shel dkar dang ka ko la
T16D4441:357b-9: cha mnyam (gsha' tshe) du btags pa se ba bzhi
T16D4441:357b-10: dang mnyam du btang na tsha ba'i nad rigs thams
T16D4441:357b-13: ha ri ta la ta ba ki srang nyi shu
T16D4441:357b-14: zhib par btags la ras la gtums khog mar gong
T16D4441:357b-15: gi 'bras chu skyur mo'i nang du bcug la ras
T16D4441:357b-16: khog ma'i mthil lam reg pa'i ngos ras thum chu
T16D4441:357b-17: dkyil du yong ba'i thi gu ri thung 'tsham pa
T16D4441:357b-18: btags pa'i shing tshag khog ma'i khar 'jog / khog
T16D4441:357b-19: ma lcags sgyed lta bu'i steng du /
T16D4441:357b-20: (bab la bcag na cig pu ltar shun pa 'bye
T16D4441:357b-21: rgyu yod pa zhig yod) bzhag nas me nyin phyed
T16D4441:357b-22: kyi ring bar ma chad par btang /
T16D4441:357b-23: de nas bton la rdo gzhong nang du aa dzya
T16D4441:357b-24: pa la srang do dang mnyam ras shing gi rtsa
T16D4441:357b-25: bas khu ba byas la nyin gsum gyi bar du
T16D4441:357b-26: snur / de bzhin du pa la sha'i khu ba /
T16D4441:357b-30: ba ta ku ai'i khu ba rnams kyis rim pa bzhin nyin gsum re'i bar snur la /
T16D4441:357b-31: de nas srab 'thug bag lo tsam byas la skam /
T16D4441:357b-32: de nas khog ma'i nang du pa la sha brdar
T16D4441:357b-33: ba'i phye mas khog ma'i phyed brgyangs pa'i steng du
T16D4441:357b-34: bzhag / de steng du yang shing phye khengs par
T16D4441:357b-35: blug la kha gcod legs par 'grig pa'i mtshams 'jim
T16D4441:357b-36: pas gtums nas rlung mi 'chor ba byas /
T16D4441:357b-37: de lcags sgyed kyi steng du bzhag la thog mar
T16D4441:357b-38: nyin phyed kyi bar me chung ba rta ma chad
T16D4441:357b-39: tsam re btang / de nas nyin phyed kyi bar de las che tsam btang /
T16D4441:357b-40: de nas nyin mtshan gnyis kyi ring me shin tu tsha ba btang /
T16D4441:357b-41: de nas grang thag chod pa dang bton la rdo
T16D4441:357b-42: gzhong gi nang du zhib par btags la ras la
T16D4441:357b-43: btsags pa se ba phyed dang hla dhi (lga ser)
T16D4441:357b-44: zho do dang mnyam du zos na khrag mkhris kyi
T16D4441:357b-45: nad sel lo // ba yi bi (byi thang ka)
T16D4441:357b-46: rangga zho gang ha la dhi zho do bcas zhag
T16D4441:357b-47: nyi shu rtsa gcig gi ring zos na skom pa'i
T16D4441:358a-1: thang chu zho lnga dang sendha lo na zho gang
T16D4441:358a-2: bcas pa zla gcig zhag bcu dgu'i bar zos na
T16D4441:358a-3: mdze dkar po'i rigs rtsa ba nas thon no /
T16D4441:358a-4: pippa la zho do dang aa ja wa na zho
T16D4441:358a-5: lnga bcas pa zhag grangs gong 'dra zos na pags
T16D4441:358a-7: ba ku tsi dang na gi zho gsum re bcas
T16D4441:358a-8: pa zla gcig zhag bcu dgu'i (rgyam tsha) bar zos
T16D4441:358a-9: na mdze nag po'i rigs rtsa ba nas thon no
T16D4441:358a-10: // ja ya ba tri dang khu ra sa aa
T16D4441:358a-11: dza wa ni zho re bcas pa (drod sman la
T16D4441:358a-12: la phud) zhag grangs gong 'dra zos na sha bkra'i
T16D4441:358a-13: // nad sal lo // ni ra gundi'i khu ba zho gsum /
T16D4441:358a-14: la bangga zho lnga dang bcas pa zla ba gcig
T16D4441:358a-15: zhag bcu dgu'i bar zos na mdzes sor mo gum
T16D4441:358a-16: pa dang yan lag zha ba sogs sos so /
T16D4441:358a-17: (/ ja ti'i me tog la la phug chung ba)
T16D4441:358a-18: shve ta su ba ri dang ma ri tsi zho
T16D4441:358a-19: re bcas pa zhag grangs gong 'dra zos na khrag
T16D4441:358a-20: la brten pa'i mdze la phan no //
T16D4441:358a-21: pippa la'i pags pa dang ja (li shi) mu ni'i
T16D4441:358a-22: pags pa zho gsum re bcas pa zla gcig zhag
T16D4441:358a-23: bcu dgu'i bar zos na mdzes sor mo 'am yan
T16D4441:358a-25: sna chad pa zhom (go yu bcag na kha dog
T16D4441:358a-26: dkar po yod pa pho ris) pa sogs sos so
T16D4441:358a-27: // pa la lo tsa na dang pa na zho
T16D4441:358a-28: re bcas pa zhag (drod sman) grangs gong bzhin zos
T16D4441:358a-29: na rlung la brten pa'i yan lag zha grum /
T16D4441:358a-30: grang ba sogs bsos par 'gyur ro //
T16D4441:358a-31: sbrang rtsi dang mnyam du zhag bcu bzhi'i bar zos na 'dus pa'i nad sel lo //
T16D4441:358a-32: la wangga se ba bzhi dang mnyam du zhag grangs
T16D4441:358a-33: gong 'dra zos na bse dug gi nad sel lo
T16D4441:358a-34: // pippa la dang sendha lo na zho re /
T16D4441:358a-35: la wangga zho do dang bcas zla ba gcig zhag
T16D4441:358a-36: bcu dgu'i bar zos na dmu rdzings kyi nad thams
T16D4441:358a-40: gu ra gsum zho do dang (li shi) bcas pa
T16D4441:358a-41: zhag grangs gong bzhin zos na mgo gzer gyi nad
T16D4441:358a-42: sel lo // shunthi dang aa sa gandha (drod sman
T16D4441:358a-43: rgya tsha) zho re dang bcas (li shi) ba zhag
T16D4441:358a-44: nyi shu rtsa gcig gi bar zos na khong nang
T16D4441:358a-45: gi rlung skran zhi bar 'gyur ro //
T16D4441:358a-47: hir [?] bi'i khu ba zho gang (drod sman thur
T16D4441:358a-48: ma) dang bcas pa zla gcig gam zhag bcu dgu'i
T16D4441:358a-49: bar du zos na mdze rigs thams cad rtsa ba
T16D4441:358a-50: nas thon no// (lga ba spru ba) / pippa la
T16D4441:358a-51: ...(drod sman) dang da dhu ra'i ...(thang phrom) khu ba
T16D4441:358b-0: nas thon no// zho re / pan @358b dum tsam
T16D4441:358b-1: dang bcas pa zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig gi bar
T16D4441:358b-2: du zos na sgrags pa dang 'byin pa sel lo
T16D4441:358b-3: nas thon no// zho re / // ae randa'i rtsa ba dang yi bi rangga zho do re /
T16D4441:358b-4: dza ye pha la zho gang dang bcas pa nyin
T16D4441:358b-5: bcu bzhi'i bar zos na srin nad rtsa ba nas
T16D4441:358b-6: 'byin no // na ga da ba ni'i rtsa ba /
T16D4441:358b-8: shunthi gsum zho do ra dang bcas pa zla gcig
T16D4441:358b-9: zhag bcu dgu'i bar zos na rtsa 'dar gyi nad
T16D4441:358b-10: sel lo // bangga na'i khu ba zho (danda byi
T16D4441:358b-11: thang) do dang mnyam du (dz'a ti) zhag nyi shu
T16D4441:358b-12: rtsa gcig gi bar zos na sna'i nad sel lo
T16D4441:358b-13: sel lo // // ti ta ba ro la'i khu ba zho do //
T16D4441:358b-14: rangga ni'i khu ba zho drug dang bcas pa nyin
T16D4441:358b-15: (lga) bcu bzhi'i bar zos na mtshan bar rdol ba'i
T16D4441:358b-16: nad sel lo // nimbi'i pags pa zho do //
T16D4441:358b-17: aa dza wa ni zho brgyad dang bcas pa zhag
T16D4441:358b-18: nyer gcig gi bar btang na gzhang 'brum gyi nad
T16D4441:358b-19: sel lo // pippa la'i khu ba zho do dang
T16D4441:358b-20: mnyam (gser me) du zos na mri gi'i nad sel
T16D4441:358b-21: sel lo // lo // tsa ra tsi ri'i khu ba dang /
T16D4441:358b-22: shunthi zho gsum re dang bcas pa zhag nyi shu
T16D4441:358b-23: rtsa gcig gi par zos na za phrug gi nad
T16D4441:358b-24: sel lo / (/ la la phud) sbrang rtsi dang
T16D4441:358b-25: rangga ni zho gsum re dang bcas pa zhag nyi
T16D4441:358b-26: shu rtsa gcig gi bar zos kyang phan yon gong
T16D4441:358b-27: sel lo / dang 'dra'o // de rnams ni bab
T16D4441:358b-28: la btul ma kha bsgyur dang bcas pa'i phan yon
T16D4441:358b-29: sel lo / dang 'dra'o // te / sman de
T16D4441:358b-30: (lga) rnams gtong ring ro skyur ba dang la bug
T16D4441:358b-31: sel lo / dang 'dra'o // te / mi bza'/
T16D4441:358b-32: khyad par mdze nad kyi rigs la gtong skabs zas
T16D4441:358b-33: gang la 'ang tsha bsrung dgos so //
T16D4441:358b-34: gsha' dkar ram zha nye dkar po 'dul lugs ni /
T16D4441:358b-35: gsha' dkar rangga srang phyed gsum srab mthug shog bu tsam brdungs pa sen mo tsam du gtubs /
T16D4441:358b-36: aa dza wa ni dang be da ha gnyis srang
T16D4441:358b-37: nyi shu re so sor zhib par btags la gci
T16D4441:358b-38: ba khru gang gru bzhi tsam brtsegs pa'i steng du
T16D4441:358b-39: ras bting / de steng gong gi la la phud
T16D4441:358b-40: kyi phye ma'i phyed snyoms par brdal de steng ba
T16D4441:358b-41: ru ra'i phye ma'i phyed snyoms par bting /
T16D4441:358b-42: de steng gong gi zha nye dkar po bkram /
T16D4441:358b-43: (la la phud) de steng (ba tur) la la phud kyi phyi ma phyed po brdal /
T16D4441:358b-44: de steng ba ru ra'i phye ma phyed po brdal
T16D4441:358b-45: la gci ba'i me sbar te me ma yal bar
T16D4441:358b-46: bzhag / grang thag chod pa dang zha nye dkar
T16D4441:358b-47: po rnams sgrugs la rdo gzhong du zhib par btags
T16D4441:358b-48: te ras la btsags pa se ba gang /
T16D4441:359a-0: ae la ya tsi se ba gang dang shel @359a * //
T16D4441:359a-1: dkar zho gang bcas zla ba gcig gi bar btang na lus rgyags pa /
T16D4441:359a-5: rgas kha sra ba sogs yon tan dpag tu med cing stobs bskyed kyi mchog tu 'gyur ro //
T16D4441:359a-6: de ltar slob dpon kun phan bdud rtsi byin gyis
T16D4441:359a-7: mdzad pa'i tshangs pa'i rig byed rgya mtsho'i yan lag
T16D4441:359a-9: lha dbang phyug gis tshogs bdag la gnang ba'i sa
T16D4441:359a-10: mu dra pha la'i sbyor ba sogs zur bskol zab
T16D4441:359a-11: gnad can sna tshogs dang bcas sbyor ba kha bsgyur
T16D4441:359a-12: sdom pa sum brgyar nye ba'i bstan bcos 'di ni
T16D4441:359a-13: / dus gsum rgyal ba kun gyi mkhyen brtse nus
T16D4441:359a-14: ba'i spyi gzugs rgyal ba'i dbang po thams cad mkhyen
T16D4441:359a-15: gzigs chen po'i bla'i sman pa /
T16D4441:359a-16: deng dus bsil ldan gyi ljongs 'dir gso ba rig
T16D4441:359a-17: pa'i ring lugs 'dzin pa la 'gran pa'i zla thams
T16D4441:359a-18: cad dang bral ba yar stod dar mo sman rams
T16D4441:359a-19: pa blo bzang chos grags kyis 'di ltar sgyur cig
T16D4441:359a-20: zhes bka' stsal autpa la'i chun po thod du bcings
T16D4441:359a-21: te 'phags yul ma thu rar rgyal rigs mchog gi
T16D4441:359a-22: rigs las tshe'i rig byed 'dzin par gu n'a tha
T16D4441:359a-23: dang / gtsang stod 'dar gyi skad gnyis pa ngag
T16D4441:359a-24: dbang phun tshogs lhun grub kyis rab byung bcu gcig
T16D4441:359a-25: pa'i nang gi don 'grub ces pa sa lug nag
T16D4441:359a-26: pas nya ba'i yar tshes dge bar phun tshogs lugs
T16D4441:359a-27: brgya'i mdun sa pho brang chen po po ta lar
T16D4441:359a-28: bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'i yi ge
T16D4441:359a-29: pa ni nyang stod pa 'jam dbyangs dbang pos bgyis
T16D4441:359a-30: pa 'dis kyang 'gro ba mang po la phan par
